Contact Us

We're here to help. Reach out anytime for support, information, or questions about our services.

Need immediate help?

For crisis support, visit our Get Help page or call 911 for emergencies.

Get in Touch

Choose the method that works best for you. We're committed to responding promptly and connecting you with the right support.

Phone

(905) 555-HELP

Monday - Friday, 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM

For after-hours crisis support, visit our Get Help page

Email

info@iharc.ca

We aim to respond within 1 business day

Office Location

IHARC

123 Main Street

Cobourg, ON K9A 2N4

Monday - Friday, 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM

Please call ahead to ensure someone is available to meet with you.

Send us a message

Privacy Notice: We respect your privacy and will only use your information to respond to your inquiry. We do not share your personal information with third parties.

Office Hours

Monday - Friday 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM
Saturday - Sunday Closed
Statutory Holidays Closed

After Hours: For crisis support outside office hours, visit our Get Help page for 24/7 resources.

Accessibility

Wheelchair accessible entrance and facilities
Language interpretation services available
Large print materials and alternative formats
Assistive listening devices
Service animal friendly
Flexible meeting arrangements

Need accommodations? Please let us know when you contact us, and we'll work to ensure you can access our services comfortably.

Our Team

IHARC is staffed by dedicated professionals committed to serving our community with compassion, expertise, and respect.

Experienced, Caring Professionals

Our multidisciplinary team includes social workers, mental health professionals, outreach workers, and community support specialists. All staff receive ongoing training in trauma-informed care, de-escalation, and cultural competency.

Partner with us to improve safety and health across Northumberland.

Donate Now Volunteer

Integrated Homelessness & Addictions Response Centre serving Northumberland County with comprehensive support and community safety initiatives.

Contact information will be updated soon.

Visit our contact page for current information
